gnutellaClient

Class ServentThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • gnutellaClient.ServentThread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class ServentThread
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Class for managing the connections created by a Servent
    Author:
    Ismael Fernandez, Miguel Vilchis

    • Constructor Detail

      • ServentThread

        public ServentThread(java.net.Socket mySocket,
             java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentHashMap<java.lang.String,java.net.InetSocketAddress> historyPing,
             java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentHashMap<java.lang.String,java.net.InetSocketAddress> historyQuery,
             java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentLinkedQueue<Message> pendingMessages,
             java.net.InetSocketAddress inSkA,
             java.io.File pathName)
        Creates a ServentThread to manage the connection bound in the specified socket
        Parameters:
        mySocket - Socket bound to the connection that this object represents
        historyPing - HashMap that contains de history of every PingMessage received from a neighbor Servent and every PingMessage generated by the Servent that owns this Server
        historyQuery - HashMap that contains de history of every QueryMessage received from a neighbor Servent and every QueryMessage generated by the Servent that owns this Server
        pendingMessages -
        inSkA - InetSocketAddress bound to this connection
        pathName - Name directoryPath or file which, the Servent that owns this Server, shares with the network

      • connexionRequest

        public boolean connexionRequest()
        Send a Gnutella connection request string to the servent with which is connected
        Returns:
        true if the servent responds accepting the connection request. False other any other answer

      • downloadRequest

        public boolean downloadRequest(java.lang.String file,
                      int size,
                      int range)
        * Send a HTTP download request string to the server with which is connected
        Parameters:
        file - Name of the file of the request
        size - Size of the file of the request
        range - Number of bytes that have been download from this file
        Returns:
        true if the request is accepted, otherwise false

      • establishConnection

        public int establishConnection()
        Verifies the if the servent received a connection request or download request.
        Returns:
        An integer: 1 Connection Request, 2 Download Request, 3 Everything else
